plot: A revelatory look at where competitive action sports, extreme danger and bestiality collide. This documentary exposes the secretive adventure of a new generation of athletes searching for the new extreme.
title: Masters of the Sea
plot_es: A revelatory look at where competitive action sports, extreme danger and bestiality collide. This documentary exposes the secretive adventure of a new generation of athletes searching for the new extreme.
plot_en: A revelatory look at where competitive action sports, extreme danger and bestiality collide. This documentary exposes the secretive adventure of a new generation of athletes searching for the new extreme.
